content:
class TestAlignedSilencePeriodGeneral:
    def test_initialization_and_repr(self):
        aligned = AlignedSilencePeriod(10, 20)
        assert aligned.start_frames == 10
        assert aligned.end_frames == 20
        assert repr(aligned) == "AlignedSilencePeriod(10, 20)"

    def test_str_representation(self):
        aligned = AlignedSilencePeriod(5, 15)
        assert str(aligned) == "AlignedSilence 5 -> 15"

    def test_duration_frames(self):
        aligned = AlignedSilencePeriod(30, 45.7)
        expected = round(45.7 - 30)
        assert aligned.duration_frames() == expected

    def test_zero_length(self):
        aligned = AlignedSilencePeriod(100, 100)
        assert aligned.duration_frames() == 0
        assert str(aligned) == "AlignedSilence 100 -> 100"

    def test_negative_duration(self):
        aligned = AlignedSilencePeriod(50, 40)
        expected = round(40 - 50)
        assert aligned.duration_frames() == expected
        assert repr(aligned) == "AlignedSilencePeriod(50, 40)"
reasoning_content: We need to add tests for AlignedSilencePeriod methods. Provide code without markdown.
